description:
I discovered Lyle at a shopping mall where he was sitting on a bench outside a clothing store for women. He was waiting for his girlfriend, who was inside. Luckily for me, his girlfriend loves to shop, so it gave me some time to introduce myself.
As I was talking to him, I couldn't help but notice that Lyle has the sexiest blue eyes. He was wearing shorts and a tank top and I could see that he had a nice build with a lightly hairy chest.
He took my card and I went on my way, hoping that he would call. A few days later he did, and it wasn't long before I had that sexy body of his completely naked!
title: Lyle
